Hi Brendan,

Quick follow-up, apologies, I realized I sent the wrong screenshot in my last message.

Here’s the correct section we’re referring to (screenshot attached).

Just to recap:
  • We can see him on the scroll on our end
  • Let me know if this is what you were looking for, it's located on the homepage
  • If it’s still not showing, it might be a caching issue (your browser may be loading an older version of the page).
    • Try viewing the site in an incognito window, which skips the cache and shows the most up-to-date version

Thanks again for flagging this, and sorry again for the mix-up!

Hi Brendan,

Just wanted to confirm

  • We can see him on scroll on our end
  • Could you confirm if the image attached is the right one? This section is located on the homepage
  • It might be a caching issue, your browser may be loading an older version of the page.
    • Try opening it in an incognito window, which skips the cache, and see if he appears there

Let me know how you go, happy to help if it’s still not showing!

Looks good to me...can't see him on the scroll though?

Hey Brendan,

Apologies, just realized there’s one more detail we need for Paul’s profile.

For the title line beneath his name (like we’ve done for others), would you prefer something like:
  • Exercise Physiologist
  • Or perhaps: Exercise Physiologist | Strength & Conditioning Coach

For reference:
  • Jane Le Fevre: Physiotherapist | Women’s Health Physiotherapist
  • Roisin Duffy: Senior Physiotherapist

Let me know what you’d like displayed, and I’ll get it updated right away.

Hi Brendan,

Happy Friday, and thank you so much for confirming that information!

Just a quick heads-up:
  • Paul now appears on the homepage
  • His profile is live here: https://www.redohealth.com.au/team-members/paul-raptis/

Let me know if there's anything else to tweak, always happy to help.

I have just edited his quals as there was some unneeded info I miss


  • Masters of High-Performance Sport
    Bachelor of Exercise Physiology
    ASCA Strength and Conditioning Level 2
    GLA:D Certification
    Athletics Australia Level 3 Performance Coach


For his description:

Paul is an Exercise Physiologist, Athletics Coach, and Strength & Conditioning Coach with a passion for helping people move better, perform at their best, and live healthier lives.

Let's push it live then!
